API Reference¶

This page details all public packages, subpackages, modules, classes and functions included in the VERONA library.

  • verona.data package
    • verona.data.download module
    • verona.data.extractor module
    • verona.data.results module
    • verona.data.split module
    • verona.data.statistics module
    • verona.data.utils module
  • verona.evaluation package
    • verona.evaluation.metrics package
      • verona.evaluation.metrics.event module
      • verona.evaluation.metrics.suffix module
      • verona.evaluation.metrics.time module
      • verona.evaluation.metrics.utils module
    • verona.evaluation.stattests package
      • verona.evaluation.stattests.correlated_t_test module
      • verona.evaluation.stattests.hierarchical module
      • verona.evaluation.stattests.plackettluce module
      • verona.evaluation.stattests.signed_rank module
  • verona.visualization package
    • verona.visualization.metrics module
    • verona.visualization.stattests module
